content:
TERM: Knowledge Graph Integrator

DEFINITION:
Mints SPR definitions from compressed patterns, updates Tapestry nodes/edges, attaches provenance and learning metrics.

[From agi.txt]: (['Data Extraction', 'Natural Language Processing', 'Machine Learning'], [('Data Extraction', 'Natural Language Processing'), ('Natural Language Processing', 'Machine Learning')])

[From Codebase]: Class: KnowledgeGraphIntegrator

Knowledge Graph Integrator - PhD-Level Implementation
Explicitly integrates with knowledge graph for enhanced synergy analysis

Methods: __init__, load_knowledge_graph, _create_fallback_graph, _build_module_mappings, get_module_node_info, calculate_spr_synergy, find_relationships, get_capability_overlap

BLUEPRINT DETAILS:
Mints new or reuses existing SPRs; updates knowledge_tapestry.json with typed relationships and attaches provenance/metrics.

EXAMPLE APPLICATION:
Added 'InvariantmininG' SPR with links to VettingAgenT and UniversalabstractioN; recorded source and excerpt hash.

CATEGORY: SystemComponent

RELATIONSHIPS:
type: Integration; consumes: KnowledgeextractoR, ZeptopatterncompressoR; updates: knowledge_tapestry, spr_definitions

CONTEXT TYPE: Conversation-derived knowledge (no direct spec/code, enriched from agi.txt conversations)

IMPLICIT KNOWLEDGE: This SPR represents knowledge understood through conversation context and osmosis
